channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:59 MAKALABIBIBIUM ALREADY AVIRTION AVIRTEVERY BOMB (Kabiv).
item.description: 🟢 06:59 MAKALABIBIBIUM ALREADY AVIRTION AVIRTEVERY BOMB (Kabiv). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
